toolclip.title: Select By Hierarchy And Combinations
toolclip.text: Changes the selection mode to select items at the top level of their node hierarchy or some other combination by using a selection mask.

toolclip.text: Changes the selection mode to select objects.

toolclip.title: Select By Component Type
toolclip.text: Changes the selection mode to select components of an object.

toolclip.title: Lock/Unlock current selection
toolclip.text: Locks tool manipulators to the selected object so that left-click operates manipulator instead of selecting.

toolclip.title: Highlight selection mode
toolclip.text: Locks component selection mode, preventing switch to object selection mode.

toolclip.title: Snap to grids
toolclip.text: Moves the selected item to the nearest grid intersection point.

toolclip.title: Snap to curves
toolclip.text: Moves the selected item to the nearest curve.

toolclip.title: Snap to points
toolclip.text: Moves the selected item to the nearest control vertex or pivot point.

toolclip.title: Snap to Projected Center
toolclip.text: Snaps to the center of the selected object.

toolclip.title: Snap to view planes
toolclip.text: Moves the selected item to the nearest view plane.

toolclip.title: Make the selected object live
toolclip.text: Converts the selected surface to a live surface (RMB to select from previous live surfaces).

toolclip.title: Inputs to the selected object
toolclip.text: Controls upstream node connections for the selected object.

toolclip.title: Outputs from the selected object
toolclip.text: Controls downstream node connections for the selected object.

toolclip.title: Construction History on/off
toolclip.text: Toggles construction history on or off for all items in the scene.

toolclip.title: Input line menu of operations
toolclip.text: Specifies an input type for the Input Line.
